summary: TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 2000 JEEP GRAND CHEROKEE.  IN JULY 2006, THE OWNER REPAIRED THE ENGINE COOLING SYSTEM FAN.  IN JULY 2007, HE RECEIVED A SAFETY RECALL NOTIFICATION FOR THE ENGINE COOLING COOLING SYSTEM: FAN NHTSA (CAMPAIGN #06V199000).  HE WOULD LIKE TO BE REIMBURSED FOR THE REPAIR.  THE PURCHASE DATE OF THE VEHICLE, VIN, ENGINE SIZE AND THE MILEAGE WAS UNAVAILABLE.  UPDATED 08/30/07  *TR
